title: Weird ,and  annoying way to lower ping ,but only works ONCE every game PLEASE HELP ME
body: guys every  time i play before starting the game my league says i have +100 ping ,it sucks  so i need to open task manager and  end task (league of legends ) like 2 -3 times meanwhile the game is loading when i do that my ping lowers to 80  which is nice since it was at 100-140 before, i checked the ip from riot na server and it says i should be playing with minimun 76ping,nvm i get 80 that is not the problem ,the problem is that i lose time every game and sometimes i join late and im already losing lul ,is there a way to have a stable ping? i know i cant get lower than 76 because my location ,but is there a way to at least have it at 80-79 all games without opening task manager?   it sucks. someone can help me?

replies.body:
Your latency (ping) to a server is determined by a number of different factors, with distance and network routing to the server being the most important. While it's likely that a set of traceroutes logs will be necessary to check your routing, there are a number of steps that can be taken to ensure your network configuration is as compatible with League as possible.

*Rineyy* was spot on with their analysis of the situation, and the guide they offered will address the most comprehensive steps to start troubleshooting this issue to find a fix. Let me know if you have any questions.

i just uninstalled lol ,i will install the game and i will see if that helps because i get 100-140 ping for no reason ,because im alone in my house and the ip address from riot na server says i must have minimum 76 ping,so yeah basically it has no sense to me to be playing at shit 110 ping every game,i try to open task manager while in game and end league of legends task to get 80 ping which is nice but people get mad (lul) because im "afk" and i get reported ,i really dont give a fuc* if i get banned i prefer to play less games with somewhat decent ping (80),that  a lot of  low quality games at 100-140 ping (meanwhile the other users play with 30 -60 god like ping ) funny  stuff

100 ping isn't bad and it isn't recommended for you to close League while loading or in-game as it puts your team at a disadvantage early on. Your team can also remake the match which would lead to LeaverBuster flagging your account and eventually punishments.
